Confidential & Proprietary
BEACON AMA Starter Kits: Mid-October 2014 Update
Continued great work by the sales team and channel partners for the last couple of weeks! Since our last update, 8 starter kits have been sold, bringing the total to 161 BEACON AMA starter kits deployed in the United States!
As a reminder, customers who are interested in deploying a BEACON Advanced Metering Analytics (AMA) starter kit with more than the standard amount of ORION® Cellular endpoints may work with their sales representative to discuss pricing for an expanded starter kit.
BEACON AMA Starter Kit Sales:
10/02/2014 - 10/15/2014
Please contact Cindy Kransler if you have any questions.
Video: BEACON Sales Process Training
The BEACON AMA Sales Process Training webinar, presented by John Fillinger, director-utility marketing, and Kristie Anderson, product marketing manager, is now available for viewing on the Badger Meter extranet.
Watch the webinar on the Badger Meter extranet.
Please contact John Fillinger if you have any questions.
HR-E® Approved Connectivity with Itron 100W+ ERT
Badger Meter is pleased to announce the HR-E 8-dial encoder has formal connectivity approval with Itron 100W+ ERTS. The option for the HR-E with or for Itron 100W+ ERTS will be available in the configurator next week. Please anticipate a six-week lead time at initial release.
Pricing pages for the encoder and the 100W+ ERT assembly have been updated to include reference to the HR-E.
As a reminder, Itron has chosen not to support the 60W for high resolution output. 60W customers should be transitioned to a BEACON AMA solution or to the 100W+ ERT.
Please contact Jan Boyer if you have any questions.
ModMAG® M-Series® Stocked Item Enhancement
M2000 and M4000 DC power options have been added to the mag meter stock item list. The additional stocked meters will enhance our stocked offering to include the most commonly purchased models at pre-determined, shorter lead times.
The revised document can be found on the Badger Meter extranet. Stay tuned for updates on the ModMAG stocked meter offering in future eNews messages.
Please contact Brooke Lange if you have any questions.
Advertising Award from National Rural Water Association (NRWA)
Out of 100 ads that were submitted, Badger Meter was selected as second place in National Rural Water Association's "Rural Water" Magazine Awards for our BEACON AMA Globe ad. Torre Treece, regional sales manager, accepted the award for Badger Meter during the NRWA WaterPro Tradeshow in Seattle, WA on October 6, 2014.
Please contact Marketing eNews Feedback if you have any questions.
VIDEO: BEACON AMA Customer Testimonial - Salisbury-Rowan Utilities
A new BEACON AMA Customer Testimonial video is now available on the Badger Meter extranet. Presented by Salisbury-Rowan Utilities, the video covers their positive experiences using BEACON AMA and transitioning their meters to E-Series® Ultrasonic meters.
Watch the video on the Badger Meter extranet.
